```{r packages, eval = TRUE, message = FALSE}
library(mapdeck)
library(googleway)
```



## How do I add layers to a Google Map

Very simply. You add Mapdeck's dependencies to a googleway map

```r

googleway::google_map() %>%
  mapdeck::add_dependencies()
```

Then you can add any of the Mapdeck layers


```{r}

googleway::google_map() %>%
  mapdeck::add_dependencies() %>%
	mapdeck::add_scatterplot(
		data = capitals
		, lat = "lat"
		, lon = "lon"
		, fill_colour = "country"
		, legend = T
	)

```
